languages.text: "У этого мира явно есть проблемы и их пора решать".
"This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."
languages.original_text: "У этого мира явно есть проблемы и их пора решать".

traits.locale_text: "This world clearly has problems and it is about time somebody fixed them."
"This world clearly has problems and it is about time somebody fixed them."
"This world clearly has problems. It is about time somebody fixed them."
"This world clearly has problems. It is about time somebody fixed them."
"This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."
"This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

languages.text: «Está claro que este mundo tiene problemas. Es hora de que alguien los resuelva».
languages.original_text: "This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

traits.locale_text: «Está claro que este mundo tiene problemas. Es hora de que alguien los resuelva».

languages.text: “很显然，这个世界出了问题，是时候解决这些问题了。”
languages.original_text: "This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

traits.locale_text: “很显然，这个世界出了问题，是时候解决这些问题了。”

languages.text: 「この惑星には明らかに問題がある。誰かが解決しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星には明らかに問題がある。誰かが解決しなければならない」

languages.text: « De toute évidence, ce monde est en crise et il est temps d'y remettre bon ordre. »
languages.original_text: "This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, ce monde est en crise et il est temps d'y remettre bon ordre. »

languages.text: "Bu dünyada sorunlar olduğu belli. Birisinin bunları çözmesi gerek."
languages.original_text: "This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyada sorunlar olduğu belli. Birisinin bunları çözmesi gerek."

languages.text: "Diese Welt hat wirklich Probleme. Es wird Zeit, dass wir sie lösen."
languages.original_text: "This world clearly has problems. It is about time someone fixed them."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Welt hat wirklich Probleme. Es wird Zeit, dass wir sie lösen."
